trans-unit.source: Specifies an algorithm to hash all files in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定的算法进行哈希中程序集的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: The file hash values and names in the assembly are stored in the assembly manifest.
trans-unit.target: 程序集清单中存储的文件哈希值和在程序集中的名称。

trans-unit.source: When a file is loaded, the hash value is used to verify that a file has not been changed since the manifest was built.
trans-unit.target: 当加载的文件时，哈希值用于验证由于生成清单文件已发生更改。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.AssemblyAlgorithmIdAttribute"></xref> class with the specified hash algorithm, using one of the members of <xref href="System.Configuration.Assemblies.AssemblyHashAlgorithm"></xref> to represent the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.AssemblyAlgorithmIdAttribute"></xref>使用指定的哈希算法，使用的成员之一的类<xref href="System.Configuration.Assemblies.AssemblyHashAlgorithm"></xref>来表示哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: A member of <xref uid="langword_csharp_AssemblyHashAlgorithm" name="AssemblyHashAlgorithm" href=""></xref> that represents the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref uid="langword_csharp_AssemblyHashAlgorithm" name="AssemblyHashAlgorithm" href=""></xref>表示哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.AssemblyAlgorithmIdAttribute"></xref> class with the specified hash algorithm, using an unsigned integer to represent the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Reflection.AssemblyAlgorithmIdAttribute"></xref>使用指定的哈希算法，使用一个无符号的整数来表示哈希算法的类。

trans-unit.source: An unsigned integer representing the hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示哈希算法的无符号的整数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash algorithm of an assembly manifest's contents.
trans-unit.target: 获取程序集清单内容的哈希算法。

trans-unit.source: An unsigned integer representing the assembly hash algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示程序集哈希算法的无符号的整数。
